title: Hawkish Israel Is Pulling U.S. Into War With Iran
description:
The Biden administration is appearing to endorse Israel's escalations against Iran — a move that would necessitate U.S. involvement in a new Middle East conflict no one wants.

The post Hawkish Israel Is Pulling U.S. Into War With Iran appeared first on The Intercept.

title: The U.S. Set Up the Afghan Army to Fail
description:
Echoing America’s failure in Vietnam, a new inspector general report found the U.S. built an Afghan army dependent on outside support.

The post The U.S. Set Up the Afghan Army to Fail appeared first on The Intercept.

title: Fruity Pebbles and Lucky Charms Threaten to Block “Healthy” Food Labeling Guidelines in Court
description:
The FDA’s proposed labeling requirement is facing backlash from processed food companies claiming the rule limits their free speech.

The post Fruity Pebbles and Lucky Charms Threaten to Block “Healthy” Food Labeling Guidelines in Court appeared first on The Intercept.

title: Pentagon Developed Contingency Plan for War With Iran
description:
In January, the U.S. and Israel conducted the largest joint military exercise in history.
